member.name: M:Igtampe.DictionaryOnDisk.DOD.Load(System.String)
member.param: Filename of the DOD to load

member.name: M:Igtampe.DictionaryOnDisk.DOD.Parse(System.String[])
member.summary: Parses an array of lines that formatted like a DOD. Used by the load function, and made public in case a DOD has to be loaded from somewhere other than disk.

member.name: M:Igtampe.DictionaryOnDisk.DOD.Save(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Handles saving the dictionary to disk.

member.name: M:Igtampe.DictionaryOnDisk.DOD.Prep(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Prepares the dictionary for saving, in case the DOD has to be saved somewhere other than disk.
member.param: Dictionary to convert to a DOD
member.returns: A DOD Array ready to be saved somewhere.
